title: At least 44 times over 5 years: The NIA, ED and I-T ‘crackdown’ on the media
selftext:
It's not just opposition leaders facing the wrath of central agencies. 

Since 2018, there have been at least 44 incidents of cases, raids, summons, or notices to media houses & journalists by central agencies IT, ED & NIA.

https://www.newslaundry.com/2023/05/05/at-least-44-times-over-5-years-the-nia-ed-and-i-t-crackdown-on-the-media
